name: Adarshpal S. Sethi
content: Adarsh Sethi Adarsh Sethi Professor Department of Computer and Information Sciences University of Delaware Newark, DE 19716 Office: Room 422, Smith Hall Tel: (302) 831-1945 Fax: (302) 831-8458 Email: sethi put-an-at-here udel period edu Office Hours for Spring 2019: Tuesdays 2:30 - 4:30 pm. Research Interests: Computer Networks, Network Management and Control, Fault Management and Diagnosis of Computer Networks, Software Defined Networking, Management of Mobility in Wireless Networks. More on Research ... Teaching: Recently published textbook: Now translated into Chinese: Computer Networks II (Spring 2019) Course Number: CISC 650 / ELEG 651 Room: 120 Sharp Lab Time: Mondays & Wednesdays, 3:35-4:50 pm Computer Network Performance (Spring 2019) Course Number: CISC 852 Room: 316 Gore Hall Time: Tuesdays & Thursdays 9:30 - 10:45 am More on Teaching ... Biography: B.Tech. (Honors) in Electronics and Electrical Communication Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur, India (1972). M.Tech. in Electrical Engineering, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India (1974). Ph.D. in Computer Science, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India (1978). Lecturer and Assistant Professor, Computer Science Department, Indian Institute of Technology, Kanpur, India, 1977-84. Visiting Assistant Professor, Computer Science Department, Washington State University, Pullman, WA. 1982-83. Visiting Assistant Professor, Department of Computer and Information Sciences, University of Delaware, Newark, DE. 1983-1984. Visiting Scientist, IBM Research Laboratories, Zurich, Switzerland, 1990-91. Visiting Senior Researcher, US Army Research Laboratory, Aberdeen Proving Ground, MD. 1996-97. Associate Professor and Professor, Department of Computer and Information Sciences, University of Delaware, Newark, DE. 1984-present. Professional Activities ...
